subject: Shipping not showing
description_text:
Hello,

I got my order (#SSN5292) confirmed on 25/12/2025, but since then I got no
more information about the shipment.
I was hoping you can share some information about it.

thanks in advance,

regards

conversations.body_text: Hi Hernan Brockerhof,    We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible.  Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
